mutants.code:
def maximize_number_by_one_change(num: int) -> int:
    num_str = str(num)
    first_index_of_six = num_str.find('6')
    if first_index_of_six != -1:
        return num
    num_length = len(num_str)
    value_to_add = 3 * 10 ** (num_length - first_index_of_six - 1)
    return num + value_to_add

    value_to_add = 3 / 10 ** (num_length - first_index_of_six - 1)
